title: Russian drone attack in Ukraine kills 4 family members, pregnant mother survives
desc: A Russian drone has struck a home in Ukraine's Kharkiv region in an attack that killed a father and his three small children.

title: Winter Olympics 2026: Issa Laborde - Kenya's lone ranger living his dream at Milano Cortina
desc: The Kenyan teenager, who has previously represented his country at the Winter Youth Olympic Games (YOG) Gangwon 2024, says competing in Milano Cortina is the ultimate experience: "I hope it's the beginning of something bigger for all the African nations"

title: NACOC to begin licensing for medicinal, industrial cannabis cultivation
desc: The Narcotics Control Commission (NACOC) has announced that it will soon begin issuing licences for the cultivation of cannabis strictly for medicinal and industrial purposes in Ghana.

title: Prasad overruled FDA staff to reject Moderna flu vaccine application
desc: The rejection of Moderna's flu shot application is the latest example of Vinay Prasad overruling career FDA scientists to place vaccines under harsher scrutiny.

title: Iran’s president denies it seeks nuclear weapon and admits ‘shame’ after mass protests
desc: Masoud Pezeshkian tries to convey message of national unity as negotiations with US hang in balance

title: The Pogues announce death of drummer Andrew Ranken
desc: The Pogues have announced the death of their drummer Andrew Ranken, aged 72, with "deep sadness".

title: Ghana risks dropping to top 10 most expensive countries for air passenger charges
desc: Speaking at the 5th AviationGhana Breakfast Meeting, Stellamarie Ndunge of the Board of Airline Representatives, Ghana (BAR-GH), said the new levy would make air travel less attractive and further constrain route expansion by airlines operating in and out of the country.

title: Pam Bondi testifies before House Judiciary Committee : NPR
desc: The attorney general's appearance before the House Judiciary Committee comes one year into her tenure, a period marked by a striking departure from traditions and norms at the Justice Department.

title: RBI looks to ban sales incentive to bank staffers from third party
desc: RBI proposes banning incentives to bank staff from third parties, mandates refunds for mis-selling and bars use of dark patterns in marketing financial products

title: Cyclone Gezani kills at least 31 as it tears through Madagascar's port of Toamasina
desc: Madagascar's disaster management says roads are inaccessible with trees uprooted, power poles down and ninety percent of roofs ripped off.
